code: @Override protected void doHealthCheck(Health.Builder builder) throws Exception {     JestResult healthResult = this.jestClient.execute(new io.searchbox.cluster.Health.Builder().build()).     if (healthResult.getResponseCode() != 200 || !healthResult.isSucceeded()) {         builder.down().         builder.withDetail("statusCode", healthResult.getResponseCode()).     } else {         Map<String, Object> response = this.jsonParser.parseMap(healthResult.getJsonString()).         String status = (String) response.get("status").         if (status.equals(io.searchbox.cluster.Health.Status.RED.getKey())) {             builder.outOfService().         } else {             builder.up().         }         builder.withDetails(response).     } }
